title: SQL Server Database Modernisation Specialist
description: As a Database Modernization Specialist, you will play a crucial role in optimizing our database infrastructure to support enhanced performance, scalability, and reliability. You will lead efforts to rewrite and optimize queries, redesign indexes, and implement a robust maintenance plan to ensure our databases meet the evolving needs of our applications and services. Your expertise will also guide the design and implementation of a change data capture regime to support real-time data processing and analytics. Key Responsibilities: • Manage a production high-volume SQL server in Azure. • Conduct thorough assessments of current database structures and queries to identify optimization opportunities. • Rewrite and optimize SQL queries and indexes to improve performance and efficiency. • Design and implement a regular maintenance plan for database health, including backups, integrity checks, and performance tuning. • Develop and integrate a change data capture (CDC) strategy to enable effective data synchronization and real-time analytics. • Refactor tables and stored procedures to enhance scalability and maintainability. • Collaborate with development teams to ensure seamless integration of database changes into application layers, leveraging Entity Framework (EF) where applicable. • Provide guidance and best practices on database design and management to the development team. • Stay abreast of the latest trends and technologies in database management and optimization to drive continuous improvement. • Write Ad-Hoc Reports: Utilize advanced SQL skills to create ad-hoc reports that support business decisions, demonstrating flexibility and responsiveness to immediate data analysis needs. Qualifications: • Proven experience in database optimization, including query rewriting, index tuning, and performance troubleshooting. • Strong understanding of SQL Server or comparable database technologies. • Experience with database design principles, including normalization, partitioning, and data warehousing concepts. Knowledge of data warehouse implementation and maintenance is crucial. • Familiarity with change data capture (CDC) techniques and tools. • Desirable: Experience with Microsoft Fabric, showcasing an ability to work with cutting-edge data warehousing and analytics platforms. • Experience with Entity Framework (EF) and .NET development is highly desirable. • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a keen attention to detail. • Excellent communication and collaboration skills, capable of working effectively in a team environment.
